email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a spot opportunity for 12,000MT of Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam on CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the OCEAN BREEZE, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 250m. The laycan is set for 25-30 October, and the initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 41.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
John Doe
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 41.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 25-30 October, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 41.50 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
John Doe
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Houston on 25th October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
John Doe
Global Charterers
